description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for viewing a note. It displays note details such as title, content, and last updated time, and provides actions to edit or delete the note.

classes.name: NoteViewScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays the details of a note, including title, last update time, and content, with options to edit or delete the note.

methods.name: _formatMillis
methods.description: Formats milliseconds since epoch into a human-readable date string.

methods.name: _edit
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor screen to modify the current note and refreshes the notes list afterward.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the note if it has an ID, shows a confirmation message, and navigates back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for viewing the note, including the app bar with edit and delete actions, and content display.
